name: Latarnia
description:
Latarnia is a horror game where the player interacts with the environment to try to escape
from a lighthouse. Every interaction has consequences. The player's stuck in one room, but
every time they go up the stairs the time moves forward and they can see the effects of their
actions. However, if they don't like the changes they can always go one step back by going
downstairs. There are many endings for the player to discover.

This game was made with in a 3 weeks game jam!
